# CFXMLNodeTypeCode.comment

**Case**

Indicates a comment section where the data string is the text of the comment and the additional information is `NULL`.

## Declaration

```swift
case comment
```

## Constants

- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.document**: Indicates a document where the data string is `NULL` and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLDocumentInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.element**: Indicates an element where the data string is the name of the tag and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLElementInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.attribute**: Currently not used.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.processingInstruction**: Indicates a processing instruction where the data string is the name of the target and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLProcessingInstructionInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.text**: Indicates a text section where the data string is the text’s contents and the additional information is `NULL`.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.cdataSection**: Indicates a CDATA section where the data string is the text of the CDATA and the additional information is `NULL`.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.documentFragment**: Currently not used.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.entity**: Indicates an entity where the data string is the name of the entity and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLEntityInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.entityReference**: Indicates an entity reference where the data string is the name of the referenced entity and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLEntityReferenceInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.documentType**: Indicates a document type where the data string is the name given to the top-level element and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLDocumentTypeInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.whitespace**: Indicates white space where the data string is the text of the white space and the additional information is `NULL`.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.notation**: Indicates a notation where the data string is the notation name and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLNotationInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.elementTypeDeclaration**: Indicates an element type declaration where the data string is the tag name and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLElementTypeDeclarationInfo] structure.
- **CFXMLNodeTypeCode.attributeListDeclaration**: Indicates an attribute list declaration where the data string is the tag name and the additional information is a pointer to a [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLAttributeListDeclarationInfo] structure.
